name: GlobalEventHandlers
description: The GlobalEventHandlers mixin describes the event handlers common to several interfaces like HTMLElement, Document, or Window. Each of these interfaces can, of course, add more event handlers in addition to the ones listed below.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onabort
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the abort event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onanimationcancel
members.description: An EventHandler called when an animationcancel event is sent, indicating that a running CSS animation has been canceled.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onanimationend
members.description: An EventHandler called when an animationend event is sent, indicating that a CSS animation has stopped playing.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onanimationiteration
members.description: An EventHandler called when an animationiteration event has been sent, indicating that a CSS animation has begun playing a new iteration of the animation sequence.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onanimationstart
members.description: An EventHandler called when an animationstart event is sent, indicating that a CSS animation has started playing.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onauxclick
members.description: An EventHandler called when an auxclick event is sent, indicating that a non-primary button has been pressed on an input device (e.g. a middle mouse button).

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onblur
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the blur event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onerror
members.description: Is an OnErrorEventHandler representing the code to be called when the error event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onfocus
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the focus event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.oncancel
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the cancel event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.oncanplay
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the canplay event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.oncanplaythrough
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the canplaythrough event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onchange
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the change event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onclick
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the click event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onclose
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the close event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.oncontextmenu
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the contextmenu event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.oncuechange
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the cuechange event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ondblclick
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the dblclick event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ondrag
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the drag event is raised.

parameters.name: dragHandler
parameters.description: The drag event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ondragend
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the dragend event is raised.

parameters.name: dragendHandler
parameters.description: The dragend event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ondragenter
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the dragenter event is raised.

parameters.name: dragenterHandler
parameters.description: The dragenter event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ondragexit
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the dragexit event is raised.

parameters.name: dragexitHandler
parameters.description: The dragexit event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ondragleave
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the dragleave event is raised.

parameters.name: dragleaveHandler
parameters.description: The dragleave event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ondragover
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the dragover event is raised.

parameters.name: dragoverHandler
parameters.description: The dragover event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ondragstart
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the dragstart event is raised.

parameters.name: dragstartHandler
parameters.description: The dragstart event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ondrop
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the drop event is raised.

parameters.name: dropHandler
parameters.description: The drop event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ondurationchange
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the durationchange event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onemptied
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the emptied event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onended
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the ended event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ongotpointercapture
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the gotpointercapture event type is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.oninput
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the input event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.oninvalid
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the invalid event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onkeydown
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the keydown event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onkeyup
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the keyup event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onload
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the load event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onloadeddata
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the loadeddata event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onloadedmetadata
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the loadedmetadata event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onloadend
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the loadend event is raised (when progress has stopped on the loading of a resource.)

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onloadstart
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the loadstart event is raised (when progress has begun on the loading of a resource.)

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onlostpointercapture
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the lostpointercapture event type is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onmousedown
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the mousedown event is raised.

members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the mouseenter event is raised.

members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the mouseout event is raised.

members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the mouseup event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onmousewheel
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the mousewheel event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onwheel
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the wheel event is raised.

members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pause event is raised.

members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the play event is raised.

members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the playing event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onpointerdown
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pointerdown event is raised.

parameters.name: downHandler
parameters.description: The pointerdown event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onpointermove
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pointermove event is raised.

parameters.name: moveHandler
parameters.description: The pointermove event handler for element targetElement.

members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pointerup event is raised.

parameters.name: upHandler
parameters.description: The pointerup event handler for element targetElement.

members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pointercancel event is raised.

parameters.name: cancelHandler
parameters.description: The pointercancel event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onpointerover
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pointerover event is raised.

parameters.name: overHandler
parameters.description: The pointerover event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onpointerout
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pointerout event is raised.

parameters.name: outHandler
parameters.description: The pointerout event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onpointerenter
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pointerevent event is raised.

parameters.name: enterHandler
parameters.description: The pointerenter event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onpointerleave
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pointerleave event is raised.

parameters.name: leaveHandler
parameters.description: The EventListener which will be invoked to handle pointerleave events sent to the target.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onpointerlockchange
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pointerlockchange event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onpointerlockerror
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pointerlockerror event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onprogress
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the progress event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onratechange
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the ratechange event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onreset
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the reset event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onscroll
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the scroll event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onseeked
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the seeked event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onseeking
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the seeking event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onselect
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the select event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onselectstart
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the selectionchange event is raised, i.e. when the user starts to make a new text selection on a web page.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onselectionchange
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the selectionchange event is raised, i.e. when the text selected on a web page changes.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onshow
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the show event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onsort
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the sort event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onstalled
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the stalled event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onsubmit
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the submit event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onsuspend
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the suspend event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ontimeupdate
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the timeupdate event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onvolumechange
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the volumechange event is raised.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ontouchcancel
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the touchcancel event is raised.

parameters.name: cancelHandler
parameters.description: The touchcancel event handler for element someElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ontouchend
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the touchend event is raised.

parameters.name: endHandler
parameters.description: The touchend event handler for element targetElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ontouchmove
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the touchmove event is raised.

parameters.name: moveHandler
parameters.description: The touchmove event handler for element someElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ontouchstart
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the touchstart event is raised.

parameters.name: startHandler
parameters.description: The touchstart event handler for element someElement.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ontransitioncancel
members.description: An EventHandler called when a transitioncancel event is sent, indicating that a CSS transition has been cancelled.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.ontransitionend
members.description: An EventHandler called when a transitionend event is sent, indicating that a CSS transition has finished playing.

members.name: GlobalEventHandlers.onwaiting
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the waiting event is raised.
